news_header: Waste Management reported a revenue of $5.89 billion for Q4 2024, a 13% increase from last year, with an EPS of $1.70.
news_text: For the quarter ending December 2024, Waste Management (WM) achieved a revenue of $5.89 billion, marking a 13% increase compared to the same quarter last year. The earnings per share (EPS) was reported at $1.70, slightly down from $1.74 a year ago. The revenue exceeded the Zacks Consensus Estimate by 0.18%, while the EPS fell short of the consensus estimate of $1.79 by 5.03%. Investors are advised to consider key financial metrics for a clearer understanding of the company's performance. Additionally, Zacks Investment Research has highlighted 7 elite stocks from their list of strong buys, which have historically outperformed the market.
